featured.text: The Swiss military purchasers considered the new model with a corkscrew for opening wine not “essential for survival,” so officers had to buy this new model by themselves.
We have learned much about survival from 32 forms of animal life.
Nature provides 31 with the means of survival.
The three whales Tag, Notch, and Baby were rescued because (A) younger whales have a greater chance of survival than the others.

definition.en_def: The state of continuing to live or exist, especially in difficult conditions.
definition.example: The survival of the species depends on its ability to adapt to changing environments.
